topic.title: WOMEN RECALL CEASED TOTAL (UPPER TIER LOCAL AUTHORITY)
topic.shortdesc: WOMEN RECALL CEASED TOTAL (UPPER TIER LOCAL AUTHORITY) are those women with a BREAST SCREENING CALL STATUS recorded as National Code 'Recall ceased - Bilateral Mastectomy' or 'Recall ceased - Patient choice'.
